page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In our block there is a large percentage of{unemployed}people. There is{no manufacturing industry within {our block }though a large number of people, mainly women, travel to the nearest town to a large factory estate. The majority of people employed within the block are employed in the{service {industries. }Some drive for local bus and taxi companies, others work within local garages . {Trade}within our block creates very little employment as most trade establishments are small, family owned business'.
